mapper.select: SELECT b.product_id , b.title , b.product_type , b.total_investing_amount , b.started_at , b.finished_at , b.created_time , b.modified_time , b.admin_id , b.investor_count , b.now_investing_amount , (CASE WHEN total_investing_amount <= now_investing_amount THEN 'FINISHED' ELSE 'RECRUITING' END) AS investment_recruitment_status FROM ( SELECT tp.product_id , tp.title , tp.product_type , tp.total_investing_amount , tp.started_at , tp.finished_at , tp.created_time , tp.modified_time , tp.admin_id , count(ti.investor_id) as investor_count , COALESCE(sum(tpi.invested_amount), 0) as now_investing_amount FROM tb_product tp LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_product_invest tpi ON tp.product_id = tpi.product_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_investor ti ON ti.investor_id = tpi.investor_id WHERE now() BETWEEN started_at AND finished_at group by tp.product_id , tp.title , tp.product_type , tp.total_investing_amount , tp.started_at , tp.finished_at , tp.created_time , tp.modified_time , tp.admin_id ) AS b

SELECT b.product_id , b.title , b.product_type , b.total_investing_amount , b.started_at , b.finished_at , b.created_time , b.modified_time , b.admin_id , b.investor_count , b.now_investing_amount , (CASE WHEN total_investing_amount <= now_investing_amount THEN 'FINISHED' ELSE 'RECRUITING' END) AS investment_recruitment_status FROM ( SELECT tp.product_id , tp.title , tp.product_type , tp.total_investing_amount , tp.started_at , tp.finished_at , tp.created_time , tp.modified_time , tp.admin_id , count(ti.investor_id) as investor_count , COALESCE(sum(tpi.invested_amount), 0) as now_investing_amount FROM tb_product tp LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_product_invest tpi ON tp.product_id = tpi.product_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_investor ti ON ti.investor_id = tpi.investor_id WHERE tp.product_id = #{productId} group by tp.product_id , tp.title , tp.product_type , tp.total_investing_amount , tp.started_at , tp.finished_at , tp.created_time , tp.modified_time , tp.admin_id ) AS b
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_product WHERE product_id = #{productId} and started_at > now()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_product (title, product_type, total_investing_amount, started_at, finished_at, created_time, modified_time, admin_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{productType}, #{totalInvestingAmount}, #{startedAt}, #{finishedAt}, now(), now(), #{adminId})
